import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = ({ toggleMode, mode }) => { return (
Navbar

  • Business
  • Entertainment
  • General
  • Health
  • Science
  • Sports
  • Technology
) } export default Navbar
